website_summaries.verdict: With a jogging stroller, infant car seat, and base, this travel system is a  great investment for first-time parents that can serve you for several years.
pros: Neutral colors for either boys or girls
Weight limits accommodate child from infant to preschool size
Comes with infant car seat, which clicks into the stroller
Also includes an infant seat base for the car
Stroller folds with the pull of a handle
Nice ride on these air-filled, rubber tires
cons: You may want to measure your trunk to make sure it will fit in your vehicle
It may be a bit heavy for some to lift

customer_reviews.title: A great Black Friday steal!
customer_reviews.text: Love how smooth a ride it is! Easy to fold and easy to assemble! The front wheel locking will take some learning to prevent and the stroller is very heavy but hey - time to work on my arms if I’m going to be carrying a baby everywhere all the time! Pros- Easy fold Easy assembly Big basket Smooth ride Made for tall people Wheels come off easily Cons- Heavy Front wheel locks Phone securement not made for more recent phones
customer_reviews.author: Mechdeus

customer_reviews.title: Returned but still a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: It was a good deal, but we returned it for the Britax. Based on sheer convenience and weight, we decided this wasn't the option for us. Britax was just a little over half the weight of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jami ValkosTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worst baby purchase yet!
customer_reviews.text: Used this stroller maybe 10 times... the barings are shot and is difficult to push and steer. This stroller is heavy and does not easily fold and unfold properly. This is my 3rd baby and by far the worst stroller I have ever used. I am extremely disapointed that I wasted my money as this stroller is completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for people 5’ and up. Strong and sturdy, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my daughter and her husband who are having their first baby. Husband is 5’8” and he loves it. My daughter is 5’ exactly and it hits her fight below her chest, Perect! If I listened to the review that said she was 5’ “give or take” they would have missed out on this great stroller. Easy to maneuver around. The car seat easily fit into base and stroller. Folds up nicely. The phone mont for baby to be entertained is a great touch. Safe and efficient. All around great stroller for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It's not an LX car seat as described.  Its a standard 35
customer_reviews.text: If you read the item description you will see that the travel system is supposed to come with the LX car seat but it does not. It comes with the standard 23 car seat. I contacted amazon and let them know that this is illegal. You can't advertised one thing and send out another. Hopefully they correct the issue asap but as for me they told me that there was nothing they could do.
customer_reviews.author: AAron

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Okay the reason I’m rating this so low is the front wheel always gets stuck and it never goes in the direction you want it to. I wish I had done my research because I would not have picked this stiller combo!!! It’s easy to fold but pretty heavy considering so I couldn’t use it for the first few weeks after my c-section because I couldn’t lift it by myself. Also Graco also making a car seat base that is way easier to get in and out of your car that I like more then this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Flood

customer_reviews.title: Great overall, minor setbacks.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great overall. Pro: great jogging stroller, sturdy, great product for the price, love the color, maneuvers pretty well, has to settings on the front wheel, to make is stationary or able to mover around easily. Cons: very large stroller, if you don’t have an SUV I wouldn’t buy it, never fit in my car. Also it has an area to put iPhone but is not compatible with newer iPhones I think the only iPhone that fit were 6 and below. The car seat is great and sturdy but does not give good head support.
customer_reviews.author: Yalei-3

customer_reviews.title: The stroller seems to be very sturdy and we like that it stands up on its ...
customer_reviews.text: We are expecting our first baby in August, and researched a LOT of strollers. After our research we decided to go with the Graco Fastaction Fold Jogger. This stroller has rubber wheels that help you push it on concrete, grass, gravel, etc. The stroller seems to be very sturdy and we like that it stands up on its own. Yes this stroller is larger than many of the strollers that we looked at, but it does fold up easily. Hopefully we will get several years use out of this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Nuke2212

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a runner, but I wanted a jogger because I was told they have the best performance when walking on uneven sidewalks, etc. I had gift cards from my baby shower and got the completion discount by buying it from my registry. It came, we put it together, but man we’re we surprised that the stroller is 30lbs!!! It’s sturdy, but just heavy and bulky. I’m sure it’s a great product, it’s just heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller!!! Pushes with ease and feels sturdy but light at the same time!! The infant seat is also good quality that feels strong! Safety first! The stroller Breaks down and pops up so easy! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold up, heavy, bulky
customer_reviews.text: Got this set because I knew it would be easy to fold up and easy to pop the car seat in it. There are some cons to it though, the stroller itself is really big and bulky even when folded. The tires go flat constantly which is super annoying and when not using the car seat and you just put your baby in it, the back doesn't sit up straight its always on an angle so the babe is lounging rather than sitting up straight. On the bright side, super easy to steer, smooth ride, and easy to fold up and pop in your car (even though it is heavy).
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Stroller is VERY difficult to turn - so much that I think it's defective
customer_reviews.text: We love the car seat. The stroller, however, has been a nightmare. We unboxed the stroller a couple months before baby was born, and got rid of the box and packaging materials, and it appeared as though everything was in order. The first time we used the stroller with my daughter, however, we realized there was an issue. The stroller is incredibly difficult to turn, and the front wheel somehow locks on it's own, even while out for a walk. I think it's possible that our stroller is defective, as there's no way the difficult use of this product would be typical.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Staci Fogarty Blume

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality and price!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase. It’s exactly what I was looking for and fits my husbands wishes for a stroller as well. I like that the car seat can pop in and out of the stroller. I also am happy that the car seat can click into a base in the car instead of having to belt it in every time. The stroller folds up easily. The locking front wheel is nice. It is big but most strollers are these days unless you get one of those tiny travel ones. I was also delighted that the price dropped. Such great value!
customer_reviews.author: Britt WT

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to put together than expected, though we are missing a piece to safely install the car seat into the car. I’ll be writing to the company once I figure out which piece that is. Stroller is so much more smooth than I thought, and not at all as heavy as some people insist it is. I was dreading putting the stroller together but it’s literally a click here and a click there.
customer_reviews.author: Clark and Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Versatile but hard to maneuver; heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of this stroller - great for an infant with the attachable car seat, and great for toddlers once they're too big for that! I also think the basket underneath is a good size. It fits in our Honda Civic, but only one specific way, leaving room for little else. We're also pretty disappointed with the maneuverability. The stroller turns well without baby, but once he's in there turning it is a beast! And we have a much smaller than average kid. As others have said, the front wheel locks at random and it is very heavy. Living on the second floor, we never bring it upstairs if we don't have to!
customer_reviews.author: Renae Inuwa

customer_reviews.title: VERY easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: VERY easy to assemble. Not as heavy as I expected. Our son arrives in a month so not sure how well it will be for him but so far it’s perfect: foods up nice, rides smooth (yes we took it for a test run), car seat is awesome, easy to use... very happy! Bonus, our chihuahua fits in the under compartment! Excuse the boxes in the picture we just moved and are unpacking.
customer_reviews.author: Jen G

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall people
customer_reviews.text: -I'm 5'11 and my fiancé is 6'2 and this is perfect for us. -We have a very tall almost 3 year old and it's the perfect size for him also. -It's very heavy and bulky and barely fits in my sedans trunk but I don't mind. -It was really easy for an eight month pregnant lady to put together. -The wheels/tires are very durable and my fiancé loves jogging with it so far. -Haven't used the car seat yet but it's big and will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Front wheel locks.
customer_reviews.text: We love the look and the cup holders but I get frustrated with the front wheel. It often locks and it’s difficult to maneuver. When turning the stroller, it sometimes doesn’t turn or it goes a different direction. We also notice that when we have too much weight on one side (particularly by handles) the stroller will flip backwards- which can be very dangerous. Otherwise it is sturdy and it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: P.L.

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller if you don’t intend to actually jog with it.
customer_reviews.text: I ran with it regularly for about 7 months before it became a safety hazard. Now I am not talking long distance or gravel trails. These were paved one mile jogs! Sadly the front wheel was not up for the challenge and literally came apart...ball bearings missing and wheel unstable! Now this normally wouldn’t have been a huge deal, these things happen but I cannot find a replacement wheel anywhere! My local bike shop tried ordering me a custom wheel but that didn’t work. Graco’s website has zero replacement parts for this model, and nothing on amazon! My advice, don’t buy this stroller! Now I’m stuck looking for a new stroller that hopefully won’t fall apart on me!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Heavy stroller but functional set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. Easy to assemble, stroller rolls great and turns on a dime. My only dislike of the stroller is the weight — it is SUPER heavy. I’m 5’7” and pretty solid and I struggle to lift it. Also, know it is still pretty big when folded — takes up entire cargo space of a Jeep Cherokee and I have to remove the snack tray for it to fit properly. The car seat is a typical infant seat and works as you would expect. The handle and canopy get in the way of one another when putting both down but nothing that can’t be managed.
customer_reviews.author: JMe

customer_reviews.title: and how safe and sturdy it feels
customer_reviews.text: Very excited about how smooth this stroller rides, and how safe and sturdy it feels. When folded, it is clunkier than other Graco Joggers that we have looked at. The cup holders/cell phone clips leave alot to be desired. This model doesn't fit either of our phones, since it was designed for earlier iphones, etc. Had to add a stroller caddy to the handles just to have somewhere to put my phone and keys when we head out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Neese

customer_reviews.title: Recommendable
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great, sturdy stroller and I totally recommend it! What I don’t like is the fact that the front wheel often gets stuck when I want to fold it to a upright position. I usually hold my baby in one arm, and it’s a little annoying that I have to put her down to fold the stroller. Also, I do think that because of the 3 wheels it falls over faster than our 4 wheel umbrella stroller we have. But everything else works perfect and it’s in everyday use. Love that the product doesn’t seem flimsy and still looks new after using it for 1.5 years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this travel system!
customer_reviews.text: I love this travel system! We use our jogger for weekend festivals and outdoor park visits, etc. It is a perfect stroller for an active family. I also love our car seat. It's been great for our new kiddo. Easy to find the base and install in your car. Easy for mom. Overall easy to get stroller into car and car seat in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stroller
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is a bit hard to load in and out of the SUV because it is a bit heavy but it is such a high quality stroller that it's worth it. When you are pushing it, it glides nicely and feels light weight. I love that you can lock the front wheel to stay straight or unlock to let it go whichever direction. The travel system is also amazing for the newborn stage. We will get a lot of use out of this stroller for several years and many different stages of our son's development.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M. Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm not happy with this stroller
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm not happy with this stroller. It starts to shake when I start jogging and can't use it for skating since I'm scared the wheals will fall off
customer_reviews.author: Maria Martin

customer_reviews.title: Portable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I'm probably exaggerating a little but this has been the best investment so far. The portability combined with easy transition to the car seat makes this so useful. I use the stroller daily (my daughter needs walks to help her settle down). The car seat click system makes getting my daughter in the car and stroke packed up ready to go so quick. Honestly, it's a great product and super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Rock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I dont jog, but I wanted a jogger. I've loved this. Its not light, and its pretty large...but I still love it. I use the under cart for groceries and merchandise when I am out shopping, and have depended on this travel system. I'd 100% buy it again, and am psyched for when I get to use it as a stroller alone.
customer_reviews.author: RachichiLu

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stroller is very large, takes up entire cargo space of my Explorer.
customer_reviews.author: jolson

customer_reviews.title: So quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave maneuverability 4 stars was because the front wheel can lock up on you depending on how you maneuver the stroller. I love that it can go from locked to swivel, but I don’t love that I have to make sure the wheel doesn’t lock up on me. This happened while I was just testing the stroller out in our living room right after getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: The only con I have for this is the car seat harness that the seat attaches to. I had to buy a second harness because we weren't able to release the belt that attaches to the metal hooks in my back seat. The push button got stuck and now in order to get the seat out of my vehicle, I will have to cut the belt.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: We've really liked this stroller and car seat set
customer_reviews.text: We've really liked this stroller and car seat set! The car seat has a button to loosen the straps, which is very helpful. The stroller has been great for both jogging and walks. The stroller is very big and takes up most of our trunk space in our sedan, but has worked well. The tires are susceptible to small punctures from sticker weeds, but are can be repaired or replaced with regular bike inner tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great combo for any mom and dads out there. The car seat has great safety reviews as well as it fits perfect in the stroller no issue. As my baby is getting older he is able to go in the stroller now too without the car seat if I want him to and he is securely in there and the wheels on the stroller ride like a dream. Smooth ride.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Front wheel is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Front wheel of this stroller is always getting stuck making this stroller really hard to push. It is also very heavy and takes up the entire trunk space of your car. Though the stroller is heavy, it feels cheap. It seems like a good deal, but you get what you pay for... Lastly, my normal sized Iphone does not fit into the top compartment of stroller like it is suppose to. Sort of a waste of a compartment
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M

customer_reviews.title: Love it except phone holder.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! Great design, EASY to put together. Easy to fold and unfold. I only gave 4 stars because the phone holder is way too small for any present day smartphones, specifically iPhone. I have a 10XR hubby has 6- doesn’t fit either.
customer_reviews.author: PianoBuysAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Good except for car seat holder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I love it. My only issue is that I think the click-connect car seat holder is unnecessary. I do not think it is as secure as strapping it in over the top. Yes it is convenient but the seat will tilt with sharp turns which makes me nervous.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: The car seat and base are great. I did find that some of the parts ...
customer_reviews.text: The car seat and base are great. I did find that some of the parts were put on backwards, but I easily turned them around. The front wheel on the stroller has gotten stiff and squeaky, and it won’t turn well on slicker floors like inside a store. It started out nice, but now it’s frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: A Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Like overwhelming for this first time mom
customer_reviews.text: Sending back. It’s GIANT. Like overwhelming for this first time mom. It seems like nice quality but I can hardly lift it off the ground I can’t imagine loading it in and out of the car. It was very easy to assemble I will say and I pushed it around the house it maneuvers nicely. Just waaaay too big and bulky for me.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lee

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift/ lacking first-hand knowledge!
customer_reviews.text: It's not fair for me to review this, though it looks like a very fine product. This was a gift for my niece, who is the only one who could comment on maneuverability, ease of assembly, etc. I assume she loves it because it was listed on her shower registry.
customer_reviews.author: Jane S.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stroller, is easy to put in and out, the stroller goes very well even on the grass. The compartment are fine but unfortunately it does not fit my IPhone 7 Plus, so I have to keep it on my Pocket.
customer_reviews.author: MayaStein

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this more stars if I could. It’s a really smooth ride for our baby over bumpy sidewalks with this stroller. The click connect car seat is awesome and we have enjoyed keeping her in her carseat and just unhooking her from base or stroller when she falls asleep. Would highly recommend!!! Jogging strollers are large in general but this one is great and much cheaper than BOB.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Gladson

customer_reviews.title: Best Set
customer_reviews.text: I love this jogger and carseat set. I love the big wheels for all terrain. Easily folds up and unfolds. Great canopy coverage. Cup holders are nice and deep enough that the cups don't tip. The only thing I would change is the phone holder spot. It isn't deep enough or wide enough for bigger phones, let alone with a case on. Other than that, I love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Car seat is extremely hard to remove from the base. The stroller is sooo much heavier than other strollers. It is huge and doesn’t fit well in my Honda Civic.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: The stroller was so easy to assemble, my husband started crying from happiness. It folds and unfolds easily. The car seat fits easily into the stroller. The car seat is easy to use and installation was easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use.  Well designed!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has 10 magic fingers when it comes to putting things together and we have never seen anything SO EASY to put together. It also folds so easily. Our kids love the quality of the seat and stroller and the ease of using them.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hartzler

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Good quality heavy duty stroller
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! 5 months in and we love this stroller! It can be cumbersome getting it in and out of our SUV but it’s great once unfolded. Highly recommend! The car seat works perfectly and no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: L. Smalley

customer_reviews.title: Stroller is way too big to be practical.
customer_reviews.text: I love the car seat. It is great. Not super amazing, just typical and what I was expecting. However, the stroller is huuuuuge. I have a crossover (Honda CRV) and it BARELY fits in the back of my car. It is hard to fold up, won't stay folded, and is just too big to be practical. I could never see it fitting inside a car unless you have a huge trunk.
customer_reviews.author: celialou

customer_reviews.title: 2 tires was damage
customer_reviews.text: this is my second time i bought first time i get this as a gift and they like it . this time i bought it for me and i get 2 damage tire , but over all it is good quality . and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad Abou Ayoub

customer_reviews.title: Easy to user - 5 - Easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: Stability - 5 - Highly stable no doubts Sturdiness - 5 - Feel very strong. Easy to user - 5 - Easy to fold, navigate and move. Comfortable - 5 - Easy to use and navigate Compact - 1 - Huge, even after folding its hard to put in a SUV trunk. Weight - 2 - Quite heavy so not that easy to carry if you live on 2nd floor.
customer_reviews.author: Harpreet Singh

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know how to use before baby arrives!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet baby Jesus! Make sure you know how to use this stupud thing before you have your baby. Came with no instructions on how to disconnect or adjust. So frustrating when you are postpartum and by youself!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy ann Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. It's a smooth ride, can take bumpy roads like a champ, and is really durable. It's obviously very comfy as well because my child instantly falls asleep in it. I cannot even make it 25ft and she is out! Greatest, stroller, ever!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date on carseat is over a year and a half ago....Do not buy online.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stroller for the carseat that has a good safety rating. However, its is sept 25, 2019. The carseat manufacture date was may 2018. That's over a year ago. This is a problem since the carseat is only useable for 7 years! Buyer beware!!! I tried to check the date before ordering but could not find the expiration date. Unhappy customer
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this jogger and carseat combo. Easy to install carseat into car and my baby looks so comfy. The jogger is nice and light enough for me to lug it in and out of my car myself. Folds up nicely and even stand up by itself. Very easy to put together. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dare

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and didn't break the bank!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. The jogger is easy to put together with very simple instructions. I am 9 months pregnant and did it by myself while sitting on the floor. Great quality and love the fabric. Car seat fit great in my car and I feel confident that my baby will be safe and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the worst stroller I’ve ever dealt with. The front tire doesn’t seem to want to swivel like it should and this thing doesn’t push correctly I spend more time trying to get it to push the right way than what I should be and the two back tires are already flat and I have only used it maybe 4-5 times since my son was born. I am not happy and very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D.

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: The car seat itself has been great. I suggest buying a second base so that you don’t have to switch it from car to car. It is easy to wipe out messes.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stroller and car sear
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stroller and car sear!! The infant insert is a little thin, so we just purchased another one that has more padding and softer for our newborn son. The stroller is my favorite! It is easy to assemble, fold and use! The instructions are easy to read and understand and the quality is exceptional!!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: The Chariot for my Princess.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. Had to order this product in a hurry as my baby girl decided to be born three weeks early. As a new father- had no clue !!! . Purely by gut instinct - I purchased the bundle and boy I was in luck. Love the easy of one hand folding. One year in and the product is still rock solid.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great for any terrain
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a great price on Black Friday. We love it! We had it in babe’s room and then brought downstairs - wife who is 7 months pregnant pushed it down the stairs with no issues. It does great with all sorts of surfaces. Can’t wait to use when baby gets here!
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: First time mom easy assemble !
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! drives smooth and this is my first child and I put this together all by myself ! It is big yes , but very sturdy and I like that . Feels very high quality , easy to monevour and convienient for long strolls , dr visits , family etc . Worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Ivana Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Easy to use, easy to fold, easy to store, and easy to take wheels off to put in smaller trunks. I would have given it 5 starts, but the cell phone holder wouldn't take any of our iPhones...which were 6, 7, and 8 regular models. It will fit smaller smartphones (we assume) A Great feature that I'm really bummed about:-(
customer_reviews.author: MaCart

customer_reviews.title: Great travel system
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller and car seat. It was so nice being able to move our baby around from the car to the stroller without having to change seats
customer_reviews.author: hrsc

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Got this one for a gift because we have one like it and really like it.. nice and sturdy. Stroller is a bit bulky but fold pretty easily. Pushes really nicely on gravel and rough surfaces.. car seat is great!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I love how easy it was to set up- and everything ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very LARGE stroller! I love how easy it was to set up- and everything just clicks right into place. The car seat was super easy to install in the car as well, with no issues. I will say the front wheel of the stroller is very large, but I guess that's what you get with a jogger type stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Lenhoff

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice stroller but the cellphone holder isn’t big enough for most cellphones and neither is the storage compartment. But easy to put together and fold up
customer_reviews.author: Mike Page

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and daughter in law. They picked it out after exhausted research. They are so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Love the stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love the stroller, the car seat is as expected. We bought a cushioned insert as it is not the softest or most comfortable car seat out there. We were interested in this combo due to the fact that this car seat is one of the lightest infant car seats, 7 lbs! Super easy to assemble, my husband wasn't cursing by the end of it like he was with the pack -n- play lol.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: I HATE the car seat
customer_reviews.text: I HATE the car seat. If my son falls asleep in the car, his head falls forward and the seatbelt leaves a mark on his neck. I thought maybe it was because my son was little, but I’ve had this car seat now for nine months. It doesn’t recline and it seems like an uncomfortable car seat now that I’ve seen friend’s baby car seat. The stroller is nice if you aren’t transferring it in a car somewhere (it’s too big). Not happy and finally buying a car seat that is comfortable for my baby and can recline for the times he may fall asleep in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Timpano

customer_reviews.title: I really like this set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. The stroller and the car seat are both really nice and feel secure. My only issue is that the stroller is really awkward and heavy when I am trying to fold it up and put it in the car. Despite being 5’10” and in decent shape, sometimes I avoid using the stroller because of the effort involved with getting it in and out of the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate and easy to pack.
customer_reviews.text: This folds up, literally, with the pull of one strap. The ability for it to use a carseat for infants and be used for toddlers later makes this a really good value. All of the components are quality and work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: My favorite jogger. It's so easy to use and has so much storage space for shopping, walking etc. My mom stated it's a bit heavy but she does not exercise. I did not gave a problem lifting or removing it from car but apparently my mom was dying lol so may be picking up to out in/take out car can be a challenge but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So, so happy with this stroller! Everything was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Package!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was look for at a good price point. This travel system is easy to use, transport, and more. With easily removing the wheels, the stroller itself fits easily in the trunk of my car. It’s a little heavy, but it feels more sturdy than other strollers I’ve come across. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wilk

customer_reviews.title: gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: great for what is it made for. not for off the road jogging and rugged travels but great for basic smooth surface jogging. 1 star off because the phone holder is made for earlier versions of the iphone. will not hold any phone or iphone with a case.
customer_reviews.author: A Parent :)

customer_reviews.title: Great for rough terrain-not great for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Our property has tons of gravel and has a couple of hills before the main road so this stroller is perfect for our walks. She's still too young for us to take her jogging in it but we're confident in the stability of the stroller! The only down side that I wish I considered before is the weight and size of the stroller. I have a 4door civic and the stroller just barely fits into my trunk. Aside from that, it's a mission to event angle it correctly to place in my trunk. Great for outdoor walks, jogging, and on rough terrain, but would recommend a smaller more portable stroller for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so Bought it Again
customer_reviews.text: I had one before and it worked great for our first child. Gave it away to a mother in need and still works great for them. Bought this for our second child and has same great quality. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Graco products. We use our pack n play all the time, so this travel system seemed like the right choice. The car seat is fine but doesn't adjust properly in our car to the 3+ month position. Then the stroller. Ugh. The tires don't hold air anymore. We've pumped them and they're flat the next day. I've contacted Graco and haven't gotten the support I needed to get this issue fixed. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Amazing & durable
customer_reviews.text: Best stroller ever. Didn’t realize how heavy duty it was until I saw it in reality. Beautiful & has the bells and whistles of a high quality stroller, my family calls it the “cadlilac of all strollers”. It’s a must have. (The only downside was it is so big it almost didn’t fit in my Suzuki Kizashi’s trunk- but we managed it! Can’t put anything else in my trunk besides the stroller though lol)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah marchionda

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Quick
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up with or without instructions! A little bit on the heavy side, but I expected that. The carrier connects and disconnects easily from both the base and jogger. I highly recommend it! My husband was entirely surprised when he saw how easy it was to use and loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Devin W

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Stroller, car seat and car seat booster thing comes with it. Easy to put together. My nephew put it together n it’s a smooth ride. Love it! The only thing is the phone hold is for like a iPhone 5 size. So my phone doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Folds super easy. Great jogging stroller. Does weight 30lbs so not for you if you’re looking for an easy packable one. Folds nice, is just heavy.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat/stroller combo! We’ve been using it daily for 9 months now and it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stepanovs

customer_reviews.title: Unstable after 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty decently. Except for within the first couple months that I had used it. All 3 tires got popped while walking around town from goat heads and then it started squeaking after 5 months. And now it squeaks and starts shaking like the wheels are going to fall off especially when I start jogging. Which this is supposed to be jogger but it seems more like a casual walk stroller...
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Helm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller, we use it almost every day, it's very sturdy and had real wheels with rubber tires, not plastic. Easy to get car seat in and out of and easy to fold up and take anywhere. Slightly heavy but it's manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Carli

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I love it it's super light weight super easy to use, the kick stand is kinda annoying and your phone wont fit in the phone holder but over all I'm pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bozich

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used it for a week and so far we like it a lot. Smooth ride, easy to turn and not hard to assemble. I like that it’s taller as my husband and I are both tall. Haven’t taken it on trails yet but it’s gone through grass and over uneven cement easily enough. It is bulky though and will take up an entire trunk space.
customer_reviews.author: Danton

customer_reviews.title: ... few of these graco joggers with other grandchildren and love the ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a few of these graco joggers with other grandchildren and love the ease of use, however this item was ordered and sent directly to my DIL for her baby shower. So far, she loves the car seat, very comfortable for newborn grandson, but she hasn't used the stroller yet.
customer_reviews.author: bowmakerTop Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Nice big wheels, smooth ride. Adaptable for each stage of child's growth.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this stroller and car seat combo but the stroller ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this stroller and car seat combo but the stroller is way too heavy for me. My husband has to lift it. We ended up getting the remix too so I can lift a stroller in and out of the car. But the jogging stroller is really nice and quality item. Works well and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: lzkashmir13

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the stroller that comes with this set! It drives so smoothly that I am able to push it through doors one handed with no issues at all which is huge when I’m out with baby by myself. I haven’t had any issues with the car seat or base and am very happy with them. I was nervous to order a car seat and stroller without being able to see and feel it first, but I am thrilled with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Delivery said it would be a month, but it came the next day!! Super easy to put together, EXACTLY what I wanted. Only issue I have is my phone is too big for the phone holder...but idc!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great setup and about $150 cheaper than at Babies-R-Us
customer_reviews.text: Great setup and about $150 cheaper than at Babies-R-Us. I regret not getting this right after the baby was born. It a seamless transition from out of the car into the stroller and the baby doesn't even wake up.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Bulky but great stroller/car seat
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller/car seat Only complaint is that the stroller is a bit bulky and heavy
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. The only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars was due to the strollers weight. I didn’t read how heavy it was when I bought it. It’s super easy to fold up and works great but it is a little to much for me to get in and out of the car when I’m by myself. If hubby is with me, all is good!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Little

customer_reviews.title: Sucky wheel
customer_reviews.text: Love the click connect. Con: the front wheel always gets stuck in the sideways position when you turn the stroller, making you unable to push it forward without going around to the front to turn the wheel straight. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Safety and good construction!
customer_reviews.text: The stroller/ car seat arrived perfectly, even though the box was mangled! It is easy to unfold with one hand and is very sturdy. Brought my new granddaughter home in the car seat and felt very assured.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Well built.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter and her husband loves it. They walk and jog with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jump

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were super simple for assembly and took only 5 minutes to ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was described perfectly and exceeded my expectations! Instructions were super simple for assembly and took only 5 minutes to put together and have ready! One second pull to fold and it has a stand and a clip to keep it closed! It rides very smooth even on gravel. My iPhone 7 Plus doesn’t fit, which is the only downside. Other than that, the storage compartment is very roomy and the materials used are very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Newman

customer_reviews.title: The car seat in this is really great but the stroller itself is too tall for my ...
customer_reviews.text: The car seat in this is really great but the stroller itself is too tall for my wife and she is 5'4". The height cannot be adjusted and is uncomfortable but other than that it is a pretty decent stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Kantz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Rides well. Perfect for running or walking. Well-made. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: asupel

customer_reviews.title: Good but bulky
customer_reviews.text: It was a great travel system, esp. great smooth wheels for jogging. The only downside was it was rather too heavy and a bit too big for us to put in the Civic/s trunk. So, we returned it and got Britax B Agile B Safe Elite system and we r loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Geeta Poudel

product_meta.title: Graco FastAction Fold Jogger Travel System | Includes the FastAction Fold Jogging Stroller and SnugRide 35 Infant Car Seat, Gotham
product_meta.description:
Color:Gotham

Graco's first jogger is the ultimate crossover stroller, combining all the comfort & convenience features of a traditional stroller with the performance & maneuverability of an all-terrain jogger. This stroller is loaded with innovative features like the one-second, one-hand FastAction fold bringing the ultimate in convenience to a jogger. Click Connect technology allows for a one-step, secure connection of infant car seat to stroller.. ICS- Wash removable seat cushion in cold water on delicate cycle and line dry, Stroller- To clean stroller frame and seat pad, spot clean using mild soap and warm water, Never Use Bleach. Use light oil if wheels squeak, Stroller- For child up to 50 pounds. Infant Car Seat- Rear-facing for infants from 4 – 35 pounds. and up to 32 inches. Reflectors for added low-light visibility. Child's tray with cup holder pivots or removes for no-fuss stroller entry. Care and Maintenance  *  ICS: Wash removable seat cushion in cold water on delicate cycle and line dry
   
   
 *  Stroller: To clean stroller frame and seat pad, spot clean using mild soap and warm water
   
   
 *  Never Use Bleach. Use light oil if wheels squeak
feature_bullets: Stroller dimensions: 24" W x 40" D x 42" H | Stroller seat: 12" W x 14" D x 21" H | Car Seat: 18.66" W x 30.67" D x 15.59" H
Includes the Graco SnugRide Click Connect 35 Infant Car Seat and base, rear facing for infants from 4-35lbs. and up to 32"
Air-filled rubber tires offer suspension for a smooth ride on any terrain
Locking front swivel wheel provides an Easy transition from daily strolling to jogging
Multi-position reclining seat for baby's comfort
One-second, one-hand fold has an automatic storage lock and is self-standing when folded

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars998 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
